00046 CMapLoader::CMapLoader(CMap* p_map, std::vector<CPlayer> *p_PlayerVect) :
00047 mp_vec_Player(p_PlayerVect)
00048 {
00049  mp_objvect = NULL;
00050  mp_map = p_map;
00051  m_checkpointset = false;
00052  m_NessieAlreadySpawned = false;
00053 }
00054 
00055 // Loads the map into the memory
00056 bool CMapLoader::load( Uint8 episode, Uint8 level, const std::string& path, bool loadNewMusic, bool stategame )
00057 {
00058  int t;
00059  Uint32 c=0;
00060  int numruns = 0;
00061  int resetcnt, resetpt;
00062  unsigned int planesize = 0;
00063  unsigned int curmapx=0, curmapy=0;
00064  
00065  std::string levelname = "level";
00066  if(level < 10) levelname += "0";
00067  levelname += itoa(level) + ".ck" + itoa(episode);
00068  
00069  std::ifstream MapFile;
00070  bool fileopen = OpenGameFileR(MapFile, getResourceFilename(levelname,path,true,false), std::ios::binary);
00071  
00072  mp_map->resetScrolls();
00073  mp_map->m_gamepath = path;
00074  mp_map->m_worldmap = (level == 80);
00075  
00076  // HQ Music. Load Music for a level if you have HQP
00077  if(loadNewMusic)
00078  {
00079   g_pMusicPlayer->stop();
00080   g_pMusicPlayer->LoadfromMusicTable(path, levelname);
00081  }
00082 
00083  if (!fileopen)
00084  {
00085   // only record this error message on build platforms that log errors
00086   // to a file and not to the screen.
00087   g_pLogFile->ftextOut("MapLoader: unable to open file %s<br>", levelname.c_str());
00088   return false;
00089  }
00090  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("MapLoader: file %s opened. Loading...<br>", levelname.c_str());
00091  
00092     // decompress map RLEW data
00093  std::vector<Uint16> planeitems;
00094 
00095  MapFile.seekg (0, std::ios::beg);
00096  
00097  // load the compressed data into the memory
00098  std::vector<Uint8> compdata;
00099  while( !MapFile.eof() )
00100  {
00101   compdata.push_back(static_cast<Uint8>(MapFile.get()));
00102  }
00103 
00104  MapFile.close();
00105 
00106  CRLE RLE;
00107  RLE.expandSwapped(planeitems,compdata, 0xFEFE);
00108  
00109  mp_map->m_width = planeitems.at(1);
00110  mp_map->m_height = planeitems.at(2);
00111  
00112  size_t mapsize = ((mp_map->m_width+32)*(mp_map->m_height+32));
00113 
00114  // Here goes the memory allocation function
00115  mp_map->createEmptyDataPlane(1, mapsize);
00116  
00117  planesize = planeitems.at(8);
00118  planesize /= 2; // Size of two planes, but we only need one
00119  
00120  for( c=17 ; c<planesize+17 ; c++ ) // Check against Tilesize
00121  {
00122   t = planeitems.at(c);
00123   
00124   addTile(t, curmapx, curmapy);
00125   
00126   curmapx++;
00127   if (curmapx >= mp_map->m_width)
00128   {
00129    curmapx = 0;
00130    curmapy++;
00131    if (curmapy >= mp_map->m_height) break;
00132   }
00133   
00134   if(t > 255)
00135    t=0; // If there are some invalid values in the file
00136  }
00137  
00138  // now do the sprites
00139  // get sprite data
00140  curmapx = curmapy = numruns = 0;
00141     resetcnt = resetpt = 0;
00142  
00143  if(mp_objvect && stategame == false)
00144  {
00145   std::vector<CObject*>::iterator obj = mp_objvect->begin();
00146   for( ; obj != mp_objvect->end() ; obj++ )
00147   {
00148    delete *obj;
00149    mp_objvect->pop_back();
00150   }
00151 
00152      mp_objvect->reserve(20000);
00153 
00154   for( c=planesize+17 ; c<2*planesize+16 ; c++ )
00155   {
00156    // in case the planesizes are bigger than the actual file content itself
00157    if(planeitems.size() <= c) break;
00158 
00159    t = planeitems.at(c);
00160    
00161    if (mp_map->m_worldmap) addWorldMapObject(t, curmapx, curmapy,  episode );
00162    else addEnemyObject(t, curmapx, curmapy, episode, level);
00163 
00164    curmapx++;
00165    if (curmapx >= mp_map->m_width)
00166    {
00167     curmapx = 0;
00168     curmapy++;
00169     if (curmapy >= mp_map->m_height) break;
00170    }
00171    
00172    if (++resetcnt==resetpt) curmapx = curmapy = 0;
00173   }
00174  }
00175     planeitems.clear();
00176  
00177     // Do some post calculations
00178     // Limit the scroll screens so the blocking (blue in EP1) tiles are3 never seen
00179     SDL_Rect gamerect = g_pVideoDriver->getGameResolution();
00180     mp_map->m_maxscrollx = (mp_map->m_width<<4) - gamerect.w - 32;
00181     mp_map->m_maxscrolly = (mp_map->m_height<<4) - gamerect.h - 32;
00182 
00183     // Set Scrollbuffer
00184     g_pVideoDriver->setScrollBuffer(&mp_map->m_scrollx_buf, &mp_map->m_scrolly_buf);
00185  
00186     return true;
00187 }
00188 
00189 void CMapLoader::addTile( Uint16 t, Uint16 x, Uint16 y )
00190 {
00191  // Special cases. Those happen normally, when levels are replayed.
00192  // For example if one player has battery, the level won't show that item
00193  
00194  // Now set this this tile at pos(curmapx, curmapy)
00195  mp_map->setTile(x, y, t);
00196 }
00197 
00198 void CMapLoader::addWorldMapObject(unsigned int t, Uint16 x, Uint16 y, int episode)
00199 {
00200  // This function add sprites on the map. Most of the objects are invisible.
00201  // TODO : Please convert this into ifs. There are more conditions than just switch.agree
00202  std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player;
00203  switch(t)
00204  {
00205   case 0: break;       // blank
00206   case 255:            // player start
00207    if(!m_checkpointset)
00208    {
00209     it_player = mp_vec_Player->begin();
00210     for(; it_player != mp_vec_Player->end() ; it_player++ )
00211     {
00212      it_player->exists = false;
00213      it_player->moveToForce(x<<CSF, y<<CSF);
00214     }
00215    }
00216    mp_map->m_objectlayer[x][y] = 0;
00217 
00218    it_player = mp_vec_Player->begin();
00219    for(; it_player != mp_vec_Player->end() ; it_player++ )
00220    {
00221     it_player->setupforLevelPlay();
00222     it_player->solid = it_player->godmode;
00223    }
00224 
00225    break;
00226   case NESSIE_PATH:          // spawn nessie at first occurance of her path
00227    if (episode==3)
00228    {
00229     if (!m_NessieAlreadySpawned)
00230     {
00231      CMessie *messie = new CMessie(mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_vec_Player);
00232      m_NessieAlreadySpawned = true;
00233      mp_objvect->push_back(messie);
00234     }
00235     mp_map->m_objectlayer[x][y] = NESSIE_PATH;
00236    }
00237    break;
00238   default:             // level marker
00239 
00240    // Taken from the original CloneKeen. If hard-mode chosen, swap levels 5 and 9 Episode 1
00241    if(episode == 1 && mp_map->m_Difficulty > 2)
00242    {
00243     if(t == 5)
00244      t = 9;
00245     else if(t == 9)
00246      t = 5;
00247    }
00248 
00249    mp_map->m_objectlayer[x][y] = t;
00250 
00251    if ((t&0x7fff) <= 16 && mp_vec_Player->front().mp_levels_completed[t&0x00ff])
00252    {
00253     // Change the level tile to a done sign
00254     int newtile = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties()[mp_map->at(x,y)].chgtile;
00255 
00256     // Consistency check! Some Mods have issues with that.
00257     if(episode == 1 || episode == 2)
00258     {
00259      //Use default small tile
00260      newtile = 77;
00261 
00262      // try to guess, if it is a 32x32 (4 16x16) Tile
00263      if(mp_map->at(x-1,y-1) == (unsigned int) newtile &&
00264        mp_map->at(x,y-1) == (unsigned int) newtile  &&
00265        mp_map->at(x-1,y) == (unsigned int) newtile)
00266      {
00267       mp_map->setTile(x-1, y-1, 78);
00268       mp_map->setTile(x, y-1, 79);
00269       mp_map->setTile(x-1, y, 80);
00270       newtile = 81; // br. this one
00271      }
00272     }
00273     else if(episode == 3)
00274     {
00275      newtile = 56;
00276      // try to guess, if it is a 32x32 (4 16x16) Tile
00277      if(mp_map->at(x-1, y-1) == (unsigned int) newtile &&
00278        mp_map->at(x, y-1) == (unsigned int) newtile  &&
00279        mp_map->at(x-1, y) == (unsigned int) newtile)
00280      {
00281       mp_map->setTile(x-1, y-1, 52);
00282       mp_map->setTile(x, y-1, 53);
00283       mp_map->setTile(x-1, y, 54);
00284       newtile = 55;
00285      }
00286     }
00287     mp_map->setTile(x, y, newtile);
00288    }
00289    break;
00290  }
00291 }
00292 
00293 void CMapLoader::addEnemyObject(unsigned int t, Uint16 x, Uint16 y, int episode, int level)
00294 {
00295  mp_map->m_objectlayer[x][y] = t;
00296 
00297  if (t)
00298  {
00299   if (t==255) // The player in the level!
00300   {
00301    if(x >= mp_map->m_width-2) // Edge bug. Keen would fall in some levels without this.
00302     x = 4;
00303    
00304    if(y >= mp_map->m_height-2) // Edge bug. Keen would fall in some levels without this.
00305     y = 4;
00306 
00307    std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = mp_vec_Player->begin();
00308    for(; it_player != mp_vec_Player->end() ; it_player++ )
00309    {
00310     it_player->exists = false;
00311     it_player->moveToForce(x<<CSF, y<<CSF);
00312     it_player->setupforLevelPlay();
00313    }
00314   }
00315   else
00316   {
00317    CObject *enemyobject = NULL;
00318 
00319    switch(t)
00320    {
00321    case 0: break;
00322    case -1: break;
00323    case 1:  // yorp (ep1) vort (ep2&3)
00324     if (episode == 1)
00325     {
00326      enemyobject = new CYorp( mp_map, *mp_vec_Player, x<<CSF, y<<CSF );
00327     }
00328     else if(episode == 2 || episode == 3)
00329     {
00330      enemyobject = new CVorticon( mp_map, *mp_vec_Player, x<<CSF, y<<CSF);
00331     }
00332     break;
00333    case 2:    // garg (ep1) baby vorticon (ep2&3)
00334     if (episode == 1)
00335     {
00336      enemyobject = new CGarg( mp_map, *mp_vec_Player, x<<CSF, y<<CSF );
00337     }
00338     else
00339     {
00340      enemyobject = new CVortikid( mp_map, *mp_vec_Player, x<<CSF, y<<CSF );
00341     }
00342 
00343     break;
00344    case 3:    // vorticon (ep1) Vorticon Commander (ep2)
00345     if (episode==1)
00346     {
00347      CPhysicsSettings &Phy = g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings();
00348 
00349      size_t health = (level==16) ? Phy.vorticon.commander_hp : Phy.vorticon.default_hp;
00350      enemyobject = new CVorticon( mp_map, *mp_vec_Player, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, health );
00351     }
00352     else if (episode==2)
00353     {
00354      enemyobject = new CVorticonElite( mp_map, *mp_vec_Player,
00355        *mp_objvect, x<<CSF, y<<CSF);
00356     }
00357     else if (episode==3)
00358     {
00359      enemyobject = new CVortiMom( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF,
00360            *mp_vec_Player, *mp_objvect);
00361     }
00362     break;
00363    case 4:    // butler (ep1) or scrub (ep2) or meep (ep3)
00364     if (episode==1)
00365      enemyobject = new CButler( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_vec_Player);
00366     else if (episode==2)
00367      enemyobject = new CScrub( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_vec_Player);
00368     else if (episode==3)
00369      enemyobject = new CMeep( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_vec_Player, *mp_objvect);
00370     break;
00371    case 5:    // tank robot (ep1&2) vorticon ninja (ep3)
00372     if (episode==1)
00373      enemyobject = new CTank( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_vec_Player, *mp_objvect);
00374     else if (episode==2)
00375      enemyobject = new CGuardRobot( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_objvect);
00376     else if (episode==3)
00377      enemyobject = new CVortiNinja( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_vec_Player);
00378     break;
00379    case 6:    // up-right-flying ice chunk (ep1) horiz platform (ep2)
00380     // foob (ep3)
00381     if (episode==1)
00382     {
00383      enemyobject = new CIceCannon( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF,
00384        *mp_vec_Player, *mp_objvect, 1, -1 );
00385     }
00386     else if (episode==2)
00387     {
00388      enemyobject = new CPlatform( mp_map,x<<CSF, (y<<CSF)-(4<<STC), *mp_vec_Player);
00389     }
00390     else if (episode==3)
00391     {
00392      enemyobject = new CFoob( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_vec_Player);
00393     }
00394     break;
00395    case 7:   // spark (ep2) ball (ep3) ice cannon upwards (ep1)
00396     if (episode==1)
00397     {
00398      enemyobject = new CIceCannon( mp_map,x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_vec_Player,*mp_objvect,0,-1);
00399     }
00400     else if (episode==2)
00401     {
00402      enemyobject = new CSpark( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_objvect);
00403     }
00404     else if (episode==3)
00405     {
00406      enemyobject = new CBallJack( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_vec_Player, OBJ_BALL);
00407     }
00408     break;
00409    case 8:    // jack (ep3) and ice cannon down (ep1)
00410     if (episode==1)
00411     {
00412      enemyobject = new CIceCannon( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF,*mp_vec_Player,*mp_objvect,0,1);
00413     }
00414     else if (episode==3)
00415     {
00416      enemyobject = new CBallJack( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_vec_Player, OBJ_JACK);
00417     }
00418     break;
00419    case 9:    // up-left-flying ice chunk (ep1) horiz platform (ep3)
00420     if (episode==1)
00421     {
00422      enemyobject = new CIceCannon( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_vec_Player,*mp_objvect,-1,-1);
00423     }
00424     else if (episode==3)
00425     {
00426      enemyobject = new CPlatform( mp_map, x<<CSF, (y<<CSF)-(4<<STC), *mp_vec_Player);
00427     }
00428     break;
00429    case 10:   // rope holding the stone above the final vorticon (ep1)
00430     // vert platform (ep3)
00431     if (episode==1)
00432     {
00433      enemyobject = new CRope( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF);
00434     }
00435     else if (episode==3)
00436     {
00437      enemyobject = new CPlatformVert( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_vec_Player);
00438     }
00439     break;
00440    case 11:   // jumping vorticon (ep3)
00441     if (episode==3)
00442     {
00443      enemyobject = new CVorticon( mp_map, *mp_vec_Player, x<<CSF, y<<CSF );
00444     }
00445     break;
00446    case 12:   // sparks in mortimer's machine
00447     enemyobject = new CSectorEffector( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF,
00448       *mp_vec_Player,*mp_objvect, SE_MORTIMER_SPARK);
00449     enemyobject->solid = false;
00450     break;
00451    case 13:   // mortimer's heart
00452     enemyobject = new CSectorEffector( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF,
00453       *mp_vec_Player,*mp_objvect, SE_MORTIMER_HEART);
00454     enemyobject->solid = false;
00455     break;
00456    case 14:   // right-pointing raygun (ep3)
00457     enemyobject = new CAutoRay(mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_objvect, CAutoRay::HORIZONTAL);
00458     break;
00459    case 15:   // vertical raygun (ep3)
00460     enemyobject = new CAutoRay(mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF, *mp_objvect, CAutoRay::VERTICAL);
00461     break;
00462    case 16:  // mortimer's arms
00463     enemyobject = new CSectorEffector( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF,
00464       *mp_vec_Player,*mp_objvect, SE_MORTIMER_ARM );
00465     enemyobject->solid = false;
00466     break;
00467    case 17:  // mortimer's left leg
00468     enemyobject = new CSectorEffector( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF,
00469       *mp_vec_Player,*mp_objvect, SE_MORTIMER_LEG_LEFT );
00470     enemyobject->solid = false;
00471     break;
00472    case 18:  // mortimer's right leg
00473     enemyobject = new CSectorEffector( mp_map, x<<CSF, y<<CSF,
00474       *mp_vec_Player,*mp_objvect, SE_MORTIMER_LEG_RIGHT );
00475     enemyobject->solid = false;
00476     break;
00477    default:
00478     g_pLogFile->ftextOut(PURPLE,"unknown enemy type %d at (%d,%d)<br>", t, x, y);
00479     break;
00480    }
00481 
00482    if(enemyobject)
00483     mp_objvect->push_back(enemyobject);
00484   }
00485  }
00486 }
